Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 92nd/Burley
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted EB: 92nd, Houston, 91st, Buffalo and 92nd; WB 92nd, Burley, 92st, Houston and 92nd: due to, street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 92nd/Burley due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

Eastbound buses will operate via 92bd, Houston, 91st, Buffalo and 92nd including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 92nd, Burley, 91st, Houston and 92nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Torrence
ShortDescription: Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 104th, Muskegon and 106th: due to, street blockage near 106th/Torrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 104th, Muskegon and 106th: due to, street blockage near 106th/Torrence.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
